nodes.text: Shaped charges were a class of demolition device that made use of an explosive placed inside a conical plasteel case. The case's shape meant that when the device detonated, the blast's kinetic energy would all be directed into the same point. A single shaped charge cost 500 credits.
Galven patterns was mentioned in Gadgets and Gear, a roleplaying supplementary sourcebook for the Star Wars Roleplaying series that was published by Fantasy Flight Games in 2019.
